46.eng-name: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir that:a woman from Banu Makhzum stole (something), and she was brought to the Prophet. She sought the protection of Umm Salamah, but the Prophet said: "If Fatimah bint Muhammad were to steal, I would cut off her hand." And he ordered that her hand be cut off

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَكُونُ حِرْزًا وَمَا لاَ يَكُونُ
chapter.eng-name: Stealing Something that Is Kept In A Protected Place
